knimeNode.name: Spacy Lemmatizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node converts all tokens to their root form (lemma), removing cases, plurals, conjugations, etc.

fullDescription.intro: The node converts all tokens to their root form (lemma), removing cases, plurals, conjugations, etc. Not all Spacy models contain lemmatizer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a Document column that will be affected by lemmatization.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official Spacy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.
